content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #80062 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

This is an ICE but it requires writing some pretty incorrect code: P-medium? though I could imagine with const generics becoming a thing, we might want to prioritize this more since it might be more likely people will write incorrect code like this.
It panics while creating the "mismatched types" error
Which is a shame because it's the error that matters the most here IMO
And the error it gives before ICEing is kind of confusing: the size for values of type T cannot be known at compilation time
P-medium sounds appropriate though
@Léo Lanteri Thauvin mind if I try to add the label? I'm not sure if I have permissions...
If you're interested in helping with prioritization we can add you to the WG :smile:
Yes I would love to devote ~20 minutes a day to the cause if I can :blush:
(Because you won't be able to add the P-* labels with @rustbot)
@Léo Lanteri Thauvin I don't have permissions indeed. You can add me to the team or I can just wait until 2021 to discuss with others about me joining
I don't see why anyone would object
I can't add you directly but I can file a PR to rust-lang/team
Issue #80062's prioritization request has been removed.
Thanks!
(Filed team#500, requested approval from Santiago Pastorino)

Léo Lanteri Thauvin said:

(Because you won't be able to add the P-* labels with @rustbot)

I usually add labels on the issue page (am not part of the allowed team to invoke @rustbot)

apiraino said:

Léo Lanteri Thauvin said:

(Because you won't be able to add the P-* labels with @rustbot)

I usually add labels on the issue page (am not part of the allowed team to invoke @rustbot)

Sorry, I didn't understand what you meant

sorry :) i just meant that not having permissions to use the rustbot is not a blocker to assign labels (I usually apply these labels when I'm of the github issue page to understand what the issue is about)

apiraino said:

Léo Lanteri Thauvin said:

(Because you won't be able to add the P-* labels with @rustbot)

I usually add labels on the issue page (am not part of the allowed team to invoke @rustbot)

Hmm, but you're part of WG-prioritization: you should be able to invoke rustbot.
